article: Scientists think that there has been life for  _  of years. However we haven't found life on other planets  _  . The earth is a planet and it  _  around the sun. Seven other planets also go  _  the sun. The sun and its planets are  _  the solar system. The solar system is a small part of our galaxy. Scientists  have sent  lots of spacecraft to look at other planets in the solar system, and some spacecraft have gone  _  the solar system. However, no one  has discovered  any life in space yet. But why has no one from other planets sent us a message ? Have they tried to send  _  to us ?  _  so many stars in the universe, are we alone, or is there life out there in space ? We don't know.
